courseModules.title: Module 1: The 'Spicy' Content Mindset
courseModules.description: Learn the psychological triggers that make content shareable and memorable. We break down the science of virality and how to stand out in a crowded digital space.

courseModules.title: Module 2: AI-Powered Idea Generation
courseModules.description: Never run out of content ideas again. Master techniques to use AI tools like ChatGPT-4 and Claude to generate endless unique, edgy, and on-brand content concepts.

courseModules.title: Module 3: Prompt Engineering for Edge
courseModules.description: Go beyond basic prompts. Learn advanced prompt engineering to coax controversial, humorous, and thought-provoking responses from AI, giving your content a unique voice.

courseModules.title: Module 4: Crafting Viral Hooks & Scripts
courseModules.description: The first three seconds are everything. Use AI to write scroll-stopping hooks and compelling video scripts that keep your audience captivated from start to finish.

courseModules.title: Module 5: AI for Visuals & Memes
courseModules.description: Create stunning and hilarious visuals without being a designer. Leverage AI image generators like Midjourney to create custom thumbnails, memes, and graphics that get clicks.

courseModules.title: Module 6: Automation & Repurposing
courseModules.description: Work smarter, not harder. Learn to build an automated content machine that repurposes your core ideas across multiple platforms, maximizing your reach with minimal effort.
